languages.text: Everyone in the area of Voice of the Lord must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Everyone in the area of Voice of the Lord must pass a Willpower resistance test or become stunned.
Everyone in the area of Voice of the Lord must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g}.

languages.text: Все цели в области действия Голоса Владыки выполняют проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воли{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} и в случае провала оказываются {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}оглушены{/g}.
languages.original_text: Everyone in the area of Voice of the Lord must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Все цели в области действия Голос повелителя выполняют проверку Воли на сопротивление и в случае провала оказываются оглушены.
Все цели в области действия Голос повелителя выполняют проверку Воли на сопротивление и в случае провала оказываются оглушены.

languages.text: 真理之声区域内所有生物需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，未能通过检定的生物会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}眩晕{/g}状态。
languages.original_text: Everyone in the area of Voice of the Lord must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 真理之声区域内所有生物需要进行意志抗性检定，未能通过检定的生物会陷入眩晕状态。

languages.text: 主の声領域内にいる全員は{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}を行うか、{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}気絶{/g}しなければならない。
languages.original_text: Everyone in the area of Voice of the Lord must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 主の声領域内にいる全員、意志力抵抗判定に合格しなければ気絶する。

languages.text: Todas las criaturas en el área de Voz del amo deben superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} o quedar {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}aturdidas{/g}.
languages.original_text: Everyone in the area of Voice of the Lord must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Todas las criaturas en el área de Voz del amo deben superar una {g|Encyclopedia:Test}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} o quedar {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}aturdidas{/g}.

languages.text: Jeder, der sich im Gebiet der Stimme des Herrn befindet, muss eine {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} bestehen oder wird {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}betäubt{/g}.
languages.original_text: Everyone in the area of Voice of the Lord must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Jeder, der sich im Gebiet der Stimme des Herrn befindet, muss eine Willenskraft-Widerstandsprobe bestehen oder wird betäubt.

languages.text: Tout personnage présent dans la zone de Voix du Seigneur doit réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} lié à la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force Mentale{/g}, faute de quoi il subit l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}Étourdissement{/g}.
languages.original_text: Everyone in the area of Voice of the Lord must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Tout personnage présent dans la zone de Voix du Seigneur doit réussir un test de résistance lié à la Volonté, faute de quoi il subit l'effet Étourdissement.
